# Add form validation to Equipment creation

**Linear Issue:** [BUI-9](https://linear.app/builder-project/issue/BUI-9/add-form-validation-to-equipment-creation)
**Priority:** High
**Status:** Backlog


## Description

**Bug Description:**
The Equipment creation form lacks proper validation.

**Location:** frontend/src/pages/EquipmentPage.tsx

**Issues:**

* No validation for equipment name (required)
* Serial number format not validated
* No error feedback to user

**Expected Behavior:**

* Validate required fields before submission
* Show inline validation errors
* Disable submit until form is valid

**Priority:** Medium
